abstract.p: Systems, methods and apparatus for organising and monitoring education of one or more students are disclosed. The apparatus comprises a topic planner for the student comprising at least one topic category to be studied by the student and a student tracker linked to the topic planner for tracking progress by the student in studying the at least one topic category. Embodiments include a master sheet linked to the topic planner for each student, the master sheet identifying each student, a subject and one or more subject topics, and a class tracker linked to one or more of the topic planner, the master sheet and/or the student tracker for tracking progress by each student in studying each topic and each topic category.

Systems, methods and apparatus for organising and monitoring education of one or more students are disclosed. The apparatus comprises a topic planner for the student comprising at least one topic category to be studied by the student and a student tracker linked to the topic planner for tracking progress by the student in studying the at least one topic category. Embodiments include a master sheet linked to the topic planner for each student, the master sheet identifying each student, a subject and one or more subject topics, and a class tracker linked to one or more of the topic planner, the master sheet and/or the student tracker for tracking progress by each student in studying each topic and each topic category.

590794 Disclosed is a computing device for organising and monitoring education of a plurality of students. The device includes a topic planner (300) for each student, a student tracker, and a master sheet. The topic planner (300) displays at least one topic category (400) of one or more topics for a subject to be studied by the student. The student tracker for each student is linked to the respective topic planner (300) for tracking and displaying progress by the respective student in studying each of the at least one topic category (400) for each topic and providing feedback for each respective student relating to the at least one topic category as the at least one topic category is being studied. The master sheet is linked to each topic planner (300) and each student tracker and identifies each student, the subject, and the one or more topics. The computing device automatically updates corresponding fields in the student tracker when the topic planner (300) is updated. The computing device automatically updates the student tracker and topic planner (300) to reflect changes in the master sheet.

abstract.p: Systems, methods and apparatus for organising and monitoring education of one or more students are disclosed. The apparatus comprises a topic planner for the student comprising at least one topic category to be studied by the student and a student tracker linked to the topic planner for tracking progress by the student in studying the at least one topic category. Embodiments include a master sheet linked to the topic planner for each student, the master sheet identifying each student, a subject and one or more subject topics, and a class tracker linked to one or more of the topic planner, the master sheet and/or the student tracker for tracking progress by each student in studying each topic and each topic category.

La présente invention concerne des systèmes, des procédés et un dispositif d'organisation et de suivi de l'enseignement d'un ou de plusieurs élèves. Le dispositif comprend un gestionnaire de thèmes destiné à l'élève et comprenant au moins une catégorie de thèmes devant être étudiés par l'élève et un dispositif de suivi d'élève, associé au gestionnaire de thèmes et destiné à suivre la progression de l'élève dans l'étude de l'au moins une catégorie de thèmes.

Les modes de réalisation comprennent un formulaire de référence associé au gestionnaire de thèmes pour chaque élève, ledit formulaire de référence identifiant chaque élève, un sujet et un ou plusieurs thèmes sujets, et un dispositif de suivi de classe associé à un ou plusieurs du gestionnaire de sujets, du formulaire de référence et/ou du dispositif de suivi d'élève et destiné à suivre la progression de chaque élève dans l'étude de chaque thème et de chaque catégorie de thèmes.
